alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Onslow and southwestern Carteret Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Stella, or 11 miles east of Piney Green, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Stella, Swansboro, Cape Carteret, Silverdale, Peletier, Broad Creek, Kuhns, Bogue, Bogue Inlet Pier, Cedar Point and Indian Beach. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
